Comment: I posed the question to ChatGPT on what it would take in cost and time to revamp the entire building. I have personally taken a tour of Alcatraz and I can tell you that it's been severely deteriorated due to the brackish water surrounding it.  That doesn't include the cost for renovating the guards housing, the electrical system, destalinization plant that would have to be built and so much more.  Everything would need to be sent by in or airlifted by helicopter. It's completely surrounded by water.  The original housing for guards also included accommodations for their family.
